price: Und die meisten von ihnen glauben nicht an Allah, ohne (Ihm andere) beizugesellen.
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
